alert.note: Alert for Inland Broward County; Metro Broward County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Broward County through 600 PM EDT... At 530 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm near Tamarac, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Coral Springs, Davie, Plantation, Sunrise, Tamarac, Weston, Sawgrass Mills Mall, Sunshine Acres and Markham Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Inland Broward County; Metro Broward County
